name: Gyudon (Japanese Beef & Rice Bowl)
author: Sarah, The Woks of Life
ingredients: salt and pepper to taste, to garnish
method: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Heat the olive oil in a pan, add the chopped onion and garlic, and saut√© until golden.
Add the minced beef and cook until browned.
Pour in the canned tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.
